      Texture View.BloomOptions.dirt
      user provided dirt texture
      Texture View.FogOptions.skyColor
      skyTexture must be a mipmapped cubemap.

      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Gets the texture set on the given attachment point.
      参数类型为Texture的com.google.android.filament中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Engine.destroyTexture(Texture texture)
      Destroys a Texture and frees all its associated resources.
      Skybox.Builder Skybox.Builder.environment(Texture cubemap)
      Set the environment map (i.e. the skybox content).
      IndirectLight.Builder IndirectLight.Builder.irradiance(Texture cubemap)
      Sets the irradiance as a cubemap.
      boolean Engine.isValidTexture(Texture object)
      Returns whether the object is valid.
      IndirectLight.Builder IndirectLight.Builder.reflections(Texture cubemap)
      Set the reflections cubemap mipmap chain.
      void Material.setDefaultParameter(java.lang.String name, Texture texture, TextureSampler sampler)
      Sets a texture and sampler parameter on this material's default instance.
      void MaterialInstance.setParameter(java.lang.String name, Texture texture, TextureSampler sampler)
      Sets a texture and sampler parameter on this material's default instance.
      RenderTarget.Builder RenderTarget.Builder.texture(RenderTarget.AttachmentPoint attachment, Texture texture)
      Sets a texture to a given attachment point.
